msbt.message: , are you and close?We live on the same island, but I've never talked with themnot ONCE!I can't help it if some folks find my fashion sense intimidating, .
Oh! So! About
Ooh, that reminds me! I have a bit of news about from the other day
Now that I think about itI haven't seen lately. I wonder if they went on a vacation? Oh, I do hope they're alright! I confess, I'm a bit worried about them, .
That reminds me, I saw today.They seemedrather busy. I wonder what they were up to, .
You know , I happened to see yesterday.They were busy as always, but I couldn't tell you WHAT they were up to. So mysterious, that one.

You know, , it's been yet another day and I haven't seen
If you see them, could you please let them know that I miss them?
I really MUST tell you about when from came to visit
Remember when from visited the other day? Well, I must tell you
Say, will not be visiting our island again?I don't mean to prybut it feels like ages since they popped over from . Anyhoo, if you run into them, be sure to let them know they are welcome ANYtime, .
So, I hear that from is a friend of yours. Well, it must be nice to have a friend willing to travel ALL the way here just for a bit of fun. I hate to admit it, but I'm a wee bit jealous, !

Your friend the one who visited the other day from
You two must be dear friends. I mean, why else would they come ALL that way for a visit? Well, I do hope they come again, .
I wanted to askdo you and know each other?Their visit from piqued my curiosity, of course.I've no idea where they've gone to. Perhaps they're back to relaxing on their own island, .

So tell me, how close are you with that visitor we had? Their name was , yes? I heard they came here ALL the way from the other day. What COULD it mean? Oh dear, don't mind me! I can't help that I'm such a busybody, .
I hear they spent a luxurious amount of time living it up on . It was inspiring, really. We should all be sure to enjoy with such enthusiasm, .
I heard they caught LOADS of fish, !It was almost as if their fishing pole was enchanted. The fish couldn't resist the allure of that lure!
It seems they went on an epic bug- catching spree across the island, and their net skills are extraordinary! I tell you, I'm absolutely green with envy Alas, green is NOT a good color on me, .
I hear they picked up a lot of those shells you see lying on the beach. I meanA LOT. Of course, the question remains, what WILL they do with them all, ?

There's chatter about how they dug up some outrageous number of manila clams, darling. One can only assume they'll use the clams to make fish bait.Goodness, , they must be hoping to catch A LOT of fish!

Rumor has it they shot down balloons flying across the island with that slingshot of theirs. You know, some folks are good at and some are good at But to be able to shoot down balloons like thatwhat a rare skill indeed, .
Apparently they wished on quite a few shooting stars! I wonder, what could they be wishing for Well, I suppose with that many wishes it must be something quite grand, .

Apparently they went around shaking trees like crazy!Don't get me wrong, , I heard they were having quite a lot of fun doing it It's just, if it were meI'd be terrified that a wasp nest would fall out!
I hear they were going about chopping at trees with that axe of theirs. Perhaps they needed some wood? Or perhaps they just needed to blow off some steam. Or perhapsit was a bit of both, !
I heard they cut down a lot of trees growing on the island.They must have worked up quite a sweat with all that chopping!Well, I do hope they took a break now and thennot to mention a shower!
According to the rumor mill, they went about planting lots of flowers and trees. I don't know about you, but I just LOVE how much they love nature, .
It seems they were seen watering the island's flowers with a great deal of enthusiasm. I really must be sure to thank them. When our flowers are happy, I'm happy, .

I'm not sure what came over them, but they were being incredibly expressive. I must say, it was quite moving to see someone express their inner feelings so outwardly. I feel I have much to learn from them, .
Apparently they've been doing a bunch of island hopping.I mean, they're really living the jet-setter lifestyle!Oh, it's no use hiding it I am more than a little bit envious of their escapades, .
Talk about a social butterfly! I heard they invited friends over from other islands quite a few times. Well, bravo to them! I'm sure they're a fabulous host.

They were SO absorbed in DIY projects it was as if they were glued to the workbench! I'm simply DYING to know what it was they were making!Such a passion to create it's incredibly inspiring, don't you think, ?

The way I hear it, the tools they were using kept breaking! It was quite the ordeal, apparently. If you ask me, , it just goes to show how hard they are working. A broken tool is merely a tool that has been used to make vital improvements to !

I hear they tucked themselves away at home for a rather long time.No judgment here, darling. I enjoy being a homebody myself from time to time. In fact, one really must rest and recharge in private if one wants to make a good impression in public.
Apparently they spent a VERY long time outside. They seemed to enjoy every minute of it too! Well, I suppose they don't call it the GREAT outdoors for nothing, .

Well, my dear, they've been seen doing some VERY suspicious digging.In fact, I suspect they were making pitfall traps, of all things! The nerve!Well, whatever you do, watch where you step. You don't want to end up at the bottom of one of those.
Folks say the poor dear fell into pitfalls a number of times! Can you imagine, ? It's an important reminder that even our peaceful little has hidden dangers. You stay safe now, you hear?

You should have heard the racket coming from their home, !Apparently they were doing all kinds of redecorating in there.I can't wait to see how it turned out. Just between you and meI plan to steal ALL of their very best ideas.

I caught them staring at their phone VERY intently for a great deal of time. They must have been working on a custom design. You know how it is. It requires focus! Anyhoo, I don't know about you, , but I'm DYING to know what kind of designs they made!

My goodness, they were in a chatty mood! They nearly talked my ear right off. But to be honest, I loved every minute of it. You know me, I can be such a chatterbox, . Well, I do hope enjoyed our conversations as much as I did.

I tell you, they spent all sorts of time chatting with . They were practically inseparable! Of course, was pleased as punch by all the attention. You know how is. To be honest, it was rather adorable. Friendship is a beautiful thing, .

I don't know if you heard, but they went around talking to practically EVERYONE on the island. Well, they did more listening than talking, I'd imagine, but stillThey really put themselves out there. I was terribly impressed, .
I heard the poor thing was stung by wasps quite a few times!One really shouldn't make wasps angry.When they sting you, it not only hurtsit absolutely ruins your complexion, !

Apparently they had some horrible luck! A wasp nest dropped from a treeand, well, they got stung. Oh, , do make sure you steer clear of wasps.They are very grumpy creatures, and they will make a MESS of your face if you get close, !
Rumor has it they found quite a lot of fossils, .Impressive how they did that with just a little ol' shovel, isn't it?

Talk is they went around the island hitting rocks with a shovel!Maybe they needed some kind of material? Or maybe they just had a grudge against those rocks. Either way, I hope they got whatever it is they needed, .
I heard theywellI heard they buried Bells in the ground!And now some folks are saying they saw a sprout appear where the Bells were buried. It's become quite the popular rumor around , .
Apparently they went all around the island harvesting fruit, . What a lovely pastime, I say. As far as I'm concerned, it's right up there with .
I heard they were absolutely glued to their phone. I wonder, what WERE they so interested in? Perhaps they can recommend some good apps for me to use, .
I heard they were staring at their phone screen for, well, for a VERY long time. Did they get some new app? What sort of app would grab them like that I MUST know, !
Apparently they kept themselves quite busy building roads. Roads! That's not easy work, you know. All of their hard work makes me think that I should be doing more around here myself, .

They've been building rivers! Lots of rivers!I meando you feel that? Do you feel how the FLOW of the island is different somehow? It's the rivers! A beautiful island deserves a beautiful river system, don't you think, ?
They built some absolutely gorgeous cliffs, . Everyone is terribly impressed. I tell you, they did all that hard work as if it were the easiest thing in the world to do! Remarkable, really.
I hear they spent no small amount of time working on the island's fences.That sort of workwell, it requires some careful planning, don't you think?Oh dear, I do hope they knew what they were doing, !

Apparently they went around rearranging outdoor furniture willy-nilly! I mean, I DO understand the urge to rearrange furniture.I, too, have strong opinions about how to do exterior decoration properly, .

I heard they racked up some outlandish number of miles in just ONE day! It's true! I tell you, they are quite the hard worker, .Oooh, I bet there's SOMETHING they want to spend all those miles on. What COULD it be?

Word on the island is they managed to finish paying back some kind of loan. I heard that when they left Resident Services, they did a happy dance right then and there. I'm sure they were over the moon! I know I would be, .

I couldn't help but notice they visited Nook's Cranny a number of times. I myself LOVE that place. Not only do they sell a variety of goods, but they buy things from visitors too. Anyhoo, I don't know WHAT I would do if I couldn't get my little shopping fix, .
They composed a brand-new island tune, if you can believe it! Have you heard it? It's such a short melody, but SO well composed. I, for one, had no idea they were so talented, .

They changed the design on the flag in the plaza! It's true!Quite frankly, I didn't know WHAT to think at first. But nowI think the fact that anyone can change our island's symbol is simply wonderful! That kind of creative expression is good for us all, .
I heard they used a transformation wand to try out all kinds of fashions.Using a wand to change into stylish outfits in the blink of an eyewho WOULDN'T want to do that? Simply magical, !
I heard they used a vaulting pole to leap over one river after another! And it didn't frighten them one bit! They are much braver than I would have thought. I tell you, I couldn't do it myself, .
I heard they went all in on buying turnips from little Daisy Mae.Who knew they were such a risk taker, !

I heard they sold the turnips they acquired for QUITE an impressive amount! It seems they know how to play the stalk market Or perhaps they just got lucky. Either way, it's high time I ask them for some turnip advice, !
They were in quite the chatty mood, just yakking away like nobody's business. They don't talk about themselves very often, so it was fun to find out they have the gift for gab!

Apparently they dislike weeds as much as I do, !I tell you, I have never seen anyone pull those pesky plants with such gusto! It was VERY inspiring! I must thank them for taking the time to beautify .

They went and changed their hair up! Just like that! And it looks marvelous, . I wish I could throw caution to the wind like that when when it comes to MY coiffure. But of course, it is very hard to see how I could improve on perfection.
Perhaps it's my imagination, but I swear that their face lookeddifferent. I simply MUST find out where they get their facials done, because they looked FABULOUS, .
I heard they were quite the paparazzo, snapping all sorts of photos with that camera of theirs. Who can blame them, really? Everything about is just so photogenic!
They brought in quite the haul of sea creatures while diving, it seems!Who knew they were so skilled? I'm a little surprised and a lot jealous, actually, .
